import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"プロジェクトを作成する"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/teams/{team_id}/create_project"} context={"endpoint"} />

チーム内に新しいプロジェクトを作成し、dev または prod デプロイメントをプロビジョニングします。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"リクエスト"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"team_id","in":"path","description":"チーム ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"TeamId"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"Body"} body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["projectName","deploymentType"],"properties":{"deploymentClass":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"type":"string","enum":["s16","s256","d1024"],"title":"DeploymentClass"}]},"deploymentType":{"description":"プロジェクトには常にデプロイメントが含まれるため、このプロジェクトは\n\"dev\" 開発デプロイメントまたは \"prod\" 本番デプロイメントのいずれかで開始されます。","type":"string","enum":["dev","prod"],"title":"PlatformProjectDeploymentType"},"projectName":{"description":"ダッシュボードに表示されるプロジェクトの正式名称。スペースや\n句読点も使用できます。","type":"string","title":"ProjectName"},"region":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"type":"string","title":"Region","enum":["aws-us-east-1"]}]}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"PlatformCreateProjectArgs"}}},"required":true}} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["projectId","deploymentName","deploymentUrl"],"properties":{"deploymentName":{"type":"string","description":"このデプロイメントの読みやすい識別子。例:\nplayful-otter-123 のような文字列。"},"deploymentUrl":{"type":"string","description":"このデプロイメントがホストされているクラウド上の URL。"},"projectId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId"}},"title":"PlatformCreateProjectResponse"}}}}}} />
